metadata.title: CVE-2023-20588 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - high
metadata.description:
A division-by-zero error on some AMD processors can potentially returnspeculative data resulting in loss of confidentiality.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-20588` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-5-generic - 6.5.0-5.5
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-5-generic - 6.5.0-5.5
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-5-generic-64k - 6.5.0-5.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1005-aws - 6.5.0-1005.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1004-azure - 6.5.0-1004.4
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1004-gcp - 6.5.0-1004.4
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1005-ibm - 6.5.0-1005.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-5-lowlatency - 6.5.0-5.5.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-5-lowlatency-64k - 6.5.0-5.5.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1005-oracle - 6.5.0-1005.5
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1002-raspi - 6.5.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1002-starfive - 6.5.0-1002.3
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1003-laptop - 6.5.0-1003.6
No subscription required
